name: Somerhalder Secrets - Raised on the Bayou
name_original: Somerhalder Secrets - Raised on the Bayou
description:
Journey into the dark waters of Louisiana and reveal fun facts about the beloved Somerhalder family in a cartoon style game featuring the treasures of the bayou they were raised on.

Match the marine life caught in this Louisiana bayou fishing net. Line up 3 of a kind to cause a match. 4 of a kind removes the entire Row or Column. 5 of a kind will remove all of that item on the screen.

You can swap any two items whether it causes a match or not. This gives the player amazing control and strategic opportunities but keep in mind every move you make is deducted from the moves counter for that level.

As you progress through the game different levels have different requirements and goals. Some items such as trash left in the bayou need to be matched to be cleaned up. Some marine life are not in season or worthless and simply are set free from the net instead of being collected.

Each level has two goals.

* The Level Goal unlocks the next level for play.

* The Secret Goal unlocks a secret about the Somerhalder family.
